text: Rupert Scholz (born 23 May 1937) is a German politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Union. Scholz was born in Berlin. From 1988 to 1989, he was a member of Helmut Kohl's cabinet as German Federal Minister of Defence. From 1990 to 2002, he was a member of Bundestag. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Berlin Category:Defence ministers of Germany Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany
title: Rupert Scholz
